name: COMMUNICATIONS
description: Communications Specialists are sometimes called Public Relations Specialists. Their general responsibility is to handle public relations, information output.

name: PHOTOGRAPY
description: Photography is the art, application, and practice of creating durable images by recording light, either electronically by means of an image sensor.

name: WEB DEVELOPMENT
description: Web development is the work involved in developing a Web site for the Internet or an intranet. Web development can range from developing a simple single static page.

name: MEDIA TECHNOLOGY
description: Media technology is any hardware, software or tool that is used to compose, create, produce, deliver and manage media including audio, video, images.

name: BUSINESS ETHICS
description: Business ethics is the study of appropriate business policies and practices regarding potentially controversial subjects.

name: LEARN HTML CSS
description: Have you ever wondered how the websites we use daily have actually been designed? Or do you already know some of it and want to get on designing?

name: SOCIAL MEDIA
description: Social media management is the process of analyzing social media audiences and developing a strategy that's tailored to them.

name: DIGITAL ARTS
description: Digital art is an artistic work or practice that uses digital technology as part of the creative or presentation process.

name: MEDIA STREAMING
description: Streaming refers to any media content – live or recorded – delivered to computers and mobile devices via the internet and played back in real time. Podcasts, webcasts, movies, TV.

name: BUSINESS WORLD
description: The term business refers to an organization or enterprising entity engaged in commercial, industrial, or professional activities. Businesses can be for-profit entities or they can be non-profit organizations.

name: SEO
description: A meta description is a blurb of text that provides a brief description of a webpage. This text appears as a meta tag in a page's HTML code.

name: GRAPHICHS DESIGN
description: Graphic design is a craft where professionals create visual content to communicate messages. By applying visual hierarchy and page layout techniques.
